p: For the carotenoid determination, the spectrophotometric analysis was carried out after extraction [ 22]. The analyses were carried out in darkness to prevent carotenoid degradation and isomerisation. Before chemical extraction, leaves were homogenised in a blender and an aliquot of 5 g of the sample was weighed into a 50 mL amber coloured flask wrapped with aluminium foil. Then, 100 mL of the solvent mix (hexane/acetone/methanol 2:1:1 v/ v/ v) was added to the flask and sonicated continuously for 10 min (Misonix Ultrasonic Liquid Processor, Misonix, Inc. 1938, New Highway, Farmingdale, NY, USA).
